llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Base-case policy easing and AI/tech re-rating | What to watch: CPI/payroll convergence and Jackson Hole guidance toward gradual easing with a Sept 25bp cut if data stay in line and the 10-year near 4.23% (GX057ADL7)(37UZC9X8I) | Probability 60%
Up | 12–24 months | IPO-driven small-cap re-rating and ACMR product ramp | What to watch: IPO momentum (95 IPOs in 2025, $12.9B) and Russell 2000 discount narrowing that could lift ACMR toward $34.76 if backlog and margins stay intact (Q7VVGNSQE)(SK994CBWR) | Probability 55%
Down | 0–3 weeks | Hawkish surprises or weaker data that disrupt rate-cut expectations and reprice risk | What to watch: Jackson Hole commentary (37UZC9X8I), near-term CPI/payroll prints (GX057ADL7), and semiconductor export-control signals (H7Q52FKDH) that could push risk premia higher and lift the dollar | Probability 35%
Down | 12–24 months | Geopolitical/regulatory shocks that reallocate semiconductor capex and elevate risk premia | What to watch: Chips Act developments (Intel stake and 15% revenue cap) (H7Q52FKDH) and Nvidia/AMD licensing dynamics that could dampen AI buildouts if constraints persist (H7Q52FKDH) | Probability 40%
